title: Bill Gates skips keynote address at India AI summit amid Epstein files controversy
content:
Bill Gates skipped his scheduled keynote address.
*   The address was meant to be delivered at the India AI summit.
*   His absence is linked to the ongoing controversy surrounding the Epstein files.

title: US tech giants announce India deals at AI summit
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Major US technology companies have announced new business agreements.
*   These deals are specifically targeted at opportunities within India.
*   The announcements were made during an AI summit, suggesting a focus on artificial intelligence initiatives.

title: AI In Focus: The 2026 AI Impact Summit put in perspective
content:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is currently a central and important topic.
*   An event called the '2026 AI Impact Summit' is scheduled to take place.
*   The news aims to provide context or a broader understanding of this future summit's significance.

title: Gujarat unveils ₹4.08 lakh crore budget for tourism, AI, sports infrastructure
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Gujarat has unveiled a new state budget.
*   The budget is valued at a substantial ₹4.08 lakh crore.
*   Key sectors targeted for development include tourism, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and sports infrastructure.

title: T.N. Climate Summit ends with emphasis on tackling forest fire
content:
The T.N. Climate Summit has concluded.
*   The summit addressed various climate-related issues.
*   A key emphasis at its conclusion was placed on strategies for tackling forest fires.

title: Fishermen take oath to oppose coastal projects
content:
Fishermen have taken a collective oath.
*   The purpose of this oath is to formally oppose various coastal development projects.
*   This signifies a united and organized stand by the fishing community against these initiatives.

title: ​Troubled waters: On the Great Nicobar Project
content:
The news focuses on the Great Nicobar Project.
*   It indicates the project is currently facing significant challenges, controversies, or problems.
*   The phrase "troubled waters" suggests underlying issues, likely concerning environmental impact, indigenous rights, or implementation difficulties.

title: Govt. to further simplify process of deleting private lands from 22A list
content:
The government plans to further simplify the process.
*   This simplification relates to the deletion of private lands.
*   The lands are being removed from the specific "22A list."

title: Kerala government moves Supreme Court after High Court stalls public survey
content:
The Kerala government has moved the Supreme Court.
*   This action challenges a decision by the High Court.
*   The High Court had previously stalled a public survey initiated by the state government.

title: India adds its name to list of countries criticising Israel’s unilateral measures on West Bank
content:
India has joined a list of countries criticizing Israel.
*   The criticism specifically targets Israel's unilateral measures regarding the West Bank.
*   This action places India among nations expressing opposition to these Israeli policies.
